review:
The doctor was quite experienced. He was very patient while listening to my problems. He went through each and every aspect of my problem.
Above all he was very friendly and explained the course of action that he will take.
I would definitely star him 4+
Doctor was very nice to us and he explained everything to us. He is very friendly and helpful and very knowledgeable.
